oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pheasant Trekking in Nepal
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Haye, LoRayne
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sherpa: "You did bring a salt shakerdidn't you'"LoRayne: "Well ... ah ... no. Why'"Sherpa: " It 's the only thing that willmake the leeches drop off of you."txcerptsfrom a pheasant trek,5, 000 ft. Siang Kobang Valley,Himalayas, NepalLooking out over the valley it finallyhit me just how really far away fromhome I was ; far away from cars ,phones, jets, and T.V. sets.Hearing the ominous cry of a crestedserpent eagle (Spilornis cheela), Ishifted back into what was to be myreality for the next ten days. I was partof a team of interested people, biologistsand others , who all shared acommon bond - the deep love andappreciation for pheasants.
